sector_narrative: Structural transformation, including green, inclusive and digital transitions
description_narrative: The Project Establishes a mechanism for trilateral ans South-South Cooperation to address sustainable Development challenges related to International Cooperation to address sustainable practices.
conditions_condition_narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

1 Joint Action Plan developed 
1 Strategic Steering Committee is under preparation
1 National South-South Project Steering Committee established
1 Joint Technical Committee established
1 TOR for EOI call document finalized and the calling for EOIs online is in the process

6 Demonstration sites endorsed
1 Partnership established among MoWIE, ACCA21, and China Agriculture University
1 Standardized methodology and curriculum (documents, texts, presentations) of energy need assessment developed 
30 Government officials and experts from MoWE, and regional energy bureaus trained for energy need assessment

3 Feasibility studies for 6 demonstrate sites delivered
6 Operational RETs systems under procurement
30 Government officials, experts and focal persons from the selected institutions at the country and region levels trained for RET System Design, Installation, Operation, and Maintenance
2 Best practices produced and presented at SSTC workshops/publication launch events
1 Private energy service providers mapping in China (biogas and solar) completed
1 Assessment report developed in terms of technology assessment of RETs for productive uses, ET medium and long-term renewable energy supply and demand development plan, and ET energy price and tariff modeling research
